metadata.title: CVE-2024-0444 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
security update

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0444` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-bad-1.0 - 1.22.9-1
gstreamer1.0-opencv - 1.22.9-1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad - 1.22.9-1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad-apps - 1.22.9-1
libgstreamer-opencv1.0-0 - 1.22.9-1
libgstreamer-plugins-bad1.0-0 - 1.22.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.22.9-1').
